website_summaries.verdict: The LG V30 is a rock-solid alternative to Samsung’s Galaxy S8 Plus and the Google Pixel 2 XL. If it fits your hands and your photographic needs, you won't be disappointed.
pros: The LG V30 almost has it all: a great camera, speedy processor, huge OLED screen, excellent battery life, waterproofing, wireless charging, microSD storage and the best headphone jack on a phone
cons: Ergonomic quirks can make the V30 awkward to hold
You may miss some shots due to slow camera autofocus
Carrier-specific versions come with annoying bloatware and logos

customer_reviews.title: Model as advertised will not work with Verizon.
customer_reviews.text: The phone as ordered did not work with Verizon as stated. However, after talking with rhe vendor, and discovering he verified the model would not work with VZ, offered to replace it with a V30+ model at no extra charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: WANT A GREAT PHONE...THIS IS IT
customer_reviews.text: This phone turns on with a T-Mobile logo but it really is unlocked. One AT&T store said otherwise. A different store activated the phone routinely! The phone has worked flawlessly since activation. I really like the outstanding camera and super battery life. I registered at LG website and got 2nd year warranty coverage free!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL METZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic DAC for music
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this phone is at least very good and usually excellent. I bought it used and it works perfectly. The main reason that I chose this particular phone is for the high quality, built-in DAC. I have a Spotify premium membership and using this phone's DAC is just fantastic. Listening to music is such a pleasure whether using headphones or plugging the phone into my home preamp. It is my opinion that all premium phones should emulate the great DAC found in the LG v30.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Naramore

customer_reviews.title: Great phone all around
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphone jack, no notch(does have chin and forehead) ,great display which can be adjusted to your liking(however recommend to put on auto brightness and maybe rotate your apps on screen to prevent burn in screen). Cameras are really good phone is fast(no lag) wireless charging is great and love the fingerprint scanner. Of course there are some LG apps but not to bad and I also recommend a case due to the glass back for better grip and a screen protector.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Android phones I have ever used - a fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: At the price I paid (quite a bit less than any other 2018 flagship phone), this phone is a fantastic value. Updated to 8.0 and battery life is fantastic. No slowness anywhere. Looks great, sounds great, this one's got it all. Better than an iphone at half the cost!

customer_reviews.title: Seems just right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has had it only a few days but seems to like it quite a bit more than any other he has had. We both bought the Nexus 5 when it first came out and loved it. His finally gave up the ghost over a week ago and he had to face getting something new. He did resist, but now that he has this LG V30, he is more than pleased. It really is fast and once he had all of his personal favorites ported over--not an easy task since his Nexus had gone totally black screen at the end--he says the new phone is great. Now, I want one!

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and features, so-so battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery capacity is disappointing, though standby is very efficient, even when using always-on screen setting. Okay for casual use only. Photo and video quality and camera features are very impressive even for a photographer.

product_meta.title: LG V30 64GB 6.0" QHD+ OLED FullVision Display Smartphone SIM Free (Cloud Silver)
product_meta.description: Behold the bezel-less beauty. With its seamless curves and balanced 2:1 ratio, the LG V30 gives you full immersion while still fitting in your hand. The pleasing, textured finish protects it from stains and smudges - in fact, the phone has an IP68 rating and has even passed the *US Military Standard Drop Test (MIL STD-810G).
feature_bullets: 6.0-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1440 pixels by 2880 pixels at a PPI of 537 pixels per inch
16-megapixel primary camera on the rear and a 5-megapixel front camera
64GB of internal storage can be expanded (MicroSD)
